title: Timeline Branch Status Schema
description: Standardized enumeration of canonical statuses for alternative timeline branches in The Shadow Team Chronicles universe.

descriptions.description: Detailed explanations of each branch status (not part of the enum, provided for documentation)

primary_canon.description: The main storyline that is considered the authoritative account of events in the universe.

secondary_canon.description: Alternative sequence that is also considered 'real' within the multiverse structure but isn't the focus of main narratives.

potential_future.description: Possible outcome that may occur depending on unresolved events in the primary timeline.

averted_timeline.description: Sequence that was prevented from occurring through character actions or interventions.

parallel_reality.description: Fully realized alternate universe with its own consistent internal history.

hypothetical.description: Speculative sequence used to explore 'what if' scenarios without being treated as having actually occurred.

dream_sequence.description: Events occurring only within a character's dream, vision, or hallucination.

simulation.description: Artificially generated scenario created by technology or powers within the universe.

erased.description: Timeline that once existed but was removed from continuity through time manipulation.

quantum_possibility.description: Branch existing in quantum superposition, neither fully real nor unreal until observed or resolved.

narrative_exploration.description: Out-of-universe storytelling device used to explore themes or characters without affecting main canon.
